faqs.q: How many calories in Starbucks double smoked bacon sandwich?
faqs.a: 580 calories for the standard Double-Smoked Bacon, Cheddar & Egg Sandwich.

faqs.q: What is the protein in Starbucks double smoked bacon?
How much sodium in Starbucks double smoked bacon sandwich?

faqs.a: Yes, 41 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 3 g sugars.

faqs.q: Can I make Starbucks double smoked bacon lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, remove cheese to save ~100 kcal or swap bread for a lighter option.
